projects.title: ADT
projects.subtitle: From alarm company to smart home platform
projects.summary: Led the technical strategy and implementation for ADT's transformation from a traditional security company to a modern smart home platform, integrating IoT devices and creating a seamless user experience.

projects.title: Red Antler
projects.subtitle: Building a digital practice for brand-led innovation

projects.title: World Wide Technology
projects.subtitle: Enterprise innovation at scale

projects.title: AI Capability Exploration
projects.subtitle: From hype to practical application
projects.summary: Guided organizations through the AI landscape, helping them identify meaningful applications of machine learning and generative AI that solve real business problems.

projects.title: Startup Advisory
